coinmarketcap.WARNING_1: >>>> DO NOT PUBLISH YOUR rates-services-config.json FILE ANYWHERE <<<<
coinmarketcap.WARNING_2: >>>> NOR SHARE IT WITH ANYONE BUT CO-ADMINISTRATORS OF YOUR SERVER! <<<<
coinmarketcap.comment_0: This file is a template for a services configuration file for the rates server.
coinmarketcap.comment_3: And don't forget to replace the API keys by yours, etc.
coinmarketcap.comment_4: Leave the refractory_period at 7200 (7200 seconds = 2h) for a free API key
coinmarketcap.comment_5: Make it 30 (30 seconds, half a minute) for a $40/mo key
coinmarketcap.comment_7: You should remove the warnings and comments while you're at it.

coinlayer.comment: Free API key has only 100 calls/month, no https, wait 8h between queries
